ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: REST: The short version
ygData.msgSnippet: My understanding is that resource URIs may not be unique. Canonical example: /dists/foo-2.0.tar.gz /dists/stable.tar.gz -- fxn

  /dists/foo-2.0.tar.gz
  /dists/stable.tar.gz
